FramePack is a revolutionary AI video generator that creates high-quality videos using a 13B parameter model and Frame Packing technology.

Supported features:
- Text to video generation
- Scene generation
- Audio integration
- Custom styling
- Only requires 6GB VRAM
- Supports videos up to one minute long

Website: https://www.framepack.work
Source code: https://github.com/lllyasviel/FramePack
